name: SoBanHang
tagline: Make Modern Commerce: Fast. Easy. Effortless
description:
We created SoBanHang apps to help small and micro businesses build online stores, sell to more customers, and manage cashflow effortlessly on smartphones. 

Founded by experienced executive from leading e-commerce startups and backed by top class US investors, we want to empower 1 million businesses serving 100 millions customers market and generating 100 billions USD revenue by 2025.
